revised_title: Investigating Similarity of Motion in Fluids and Surface Friction
tldr: The authors conducted experiments to study the similarity of motion in fluids with different viscosities and densities, and investigated the limits of accuracy in calculating surface friction. They found that for geometrically similar pipes, the resistance of fluids is constant, and confirmed the existence of similar motions in fluids under certain conditions. These findings have practical applications in predicting the resistance of aircraft and understanding fluid dynamics.
